Question 40.Question: Please describe any differences in how it impacted your learning (comparing GenAI and your teacher)?
Question 40.Response: I am able to produce more polished drafts which allows my feedback to focus on the content rather then ascertaining what the fine points of my arguments are

Question 41.Question: Were there any differences in how the feedback made you feel (comparing GenAI and your teacher)?

Question 42.Question: Describe any other differences between the feedback you received from GenAI and your teacher.
Question 42.Response: Teacher was much more in depth and related to content whilst GPT was good for checking reference forms were correct and that the writing was clear and concise
